contentrichtext.text: <!-------------------------------------------------------------------------------> <!-- MoS:Disambiguation - prefer ONE LINK per entry, short descriptions. --> <!-- Avoid piping, external links, and red links with little article potential --> <!-------------------------------------------------------------------------------> {{wiktionary|widget}} '''Widget''' may refer to: *[[Widget (economics)]], a placeholder name for a manufactured device *[[Widget (beer)]], a device placed in cans and bottles of beer to aid in the generation of froth *[[Widget (Marvel Comics)]], a character in Marvel Comics *[[Widget (TV series)|''Widget'' (TV series)]] or ''Widget the World Watcher'', a 1990s animated television series **[[Widget (video game)|''Widget'' (video game)]], based on the TV series *[[Widget UK]], a UK based personal electronics distributor *[[E-9A Widget]], a turboprop airliner *''[[New York World Journal Tribune]]'' or ''The Widget'', a defunct newspaper *The widget, the logo of [[Delta Air Lines]] *Widgets, the currency used in the [[Bionicle]] universe *Widget, a male or baby [[gremlin]] *Widget, or [[blivet]], an optical illusion representing an impossible physical object ==In computing== * [[Software widget]], a generic type of software application comprising portable code intended for one or more different software platforms ** [[Widget toolkit]], a software library containing a collection of GUI widgets that collaborate when used in the construction of applications ** [[Web widget]], an applet intended to be used within web pages ** [[GUI widget]], in computer programming, a reusable element of a graphical user interface *Widget drive, a [[Apple Lisa#Drives|hard drive used only in the Apple Lisa]] computer system *A shorthand term for a cross functional group ==See also== * {{intitle|Widget}} * ''[[Widget Workshop]]'', a science-based computer game developed by Maxis * The MediaWiki [[mw:Extension:Widgets|Widgets extension]] and related widget collections {{disambiguation}}
